short_summary: Synology Products or equivalent for DND
description: Synology Products or equivalent for DND- Amendment 000 ",
full_summary:
-----------

### Notice - Request for Proposal (RFP) for Synology Products or Equivalent
#### Reference: SSC-23-00023395

The Shared Services Canada (SSC) is hereby issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for **Synology Products or Equivalent** to support the evolving technology needs of the Department of National Defence (DND).

**Important Details**

*   **Solicitation Number:** BPM019246/23395
*   **Publication Date:** 28 July 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 10 August 2023, at 14:00:00 (Eastern Daylight Time)
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Background**
------------

SSC is seeking a vendor who can provide Synology products or equivalent to meet the requirements of DND. The successful proponent must demonstrate their ability to supply the required products, providing exceptional service and support to ensure business continuity and optimal IT performance.

**Scope of Work**
----------------

The RFP is open to all interested suppliers. Respondents must submit proposals outlining their proposed solution, product offerings, and associated pricing. SSC will evaluate proposals based on the following criteria:

*   Compliance with the tender specification
*   Technical capabilities and demonstration of proof-of-concept or pilot project
*   Price and best economic value to the government
*   Performance, scalability, and reliability of the proposed solution

**Vendor Requirements**
----------------------

*   The successful proponent must demonstrate their experience in supplying Synology products or equivalent
*   Provide clear documentation outlining their proposed solution, product offerings, and associated pricing
*   Ensure compliance with the tender specification and all applicable regulations and standards
*   Exhibit a clear understanding of the overall project requirements and proposed approach

**Contact Information**
------------------------

To obtain additional information, please contact:

*   [Raiyane Benchekroun](mailto:raiyan.benchekroun@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
*   Phone: 613 324 4061
*   Fax: (613) 960-6007
*   Address: Raiyane Benchekroun, 13 Floor, 180 rue Kent St. Ottawa, ON K1G 4A8

**Submissions**
---------------

All proposals must be submitted electronically through the SSC Procurement Portal before the closing date and time specified above. Please note that late or incomplete proposals will not be considered.

We look forward to receiving your submission.
